text: Luis Javier Martínez Villanueva (born Lugo, 12 July 1971) is a Spanish rugby union player. He plays as a prop. ==Career== His first international cap was during a match against Germany, at Heidelberg, on 26 April 1998. He was part of the 1999 Rugby World Cup roster, where he played two matches. ==External links== *Luis Javier Martínez international statistics Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish rugby union players Category:Rugby union props Category:Spain international rugby union players Category:People from Lugo
title: Luis Javier Martínez
